name: Shoes off inside, please!
description: We kindly ask all guests to take off their shoes at the door. It helps us keep the home clean and cozy, especially with little ones crawling around!

name: Dirty laundry goes in the basket.
description: We've provided a laundry basket for used clothes — please use it to help us keep things tidy and organized.

name: Plant care while you're here.
description: We'd really appreciate it if you could give the houseplants a light watering every other day. It's a small gesture that helps keep them happy and green.

name: No laundry noise after 9 PM.
description: The washing machine can get pretty loud, and we like to keep evenings peaceful for everyone in the building. Please finish any laundry before 9 PM.

name: Grill hours: 10 AM - 8 PM only.
description: Feel free to enjoy the barbecue, but for safety and neighborhood peace, please only use it during this time.

name: Help us recycle.
description: We sort waste diligently. Please separate recyclables (plastic, glass, paper) from regular trash. There are clearly labeled bins to help you out.

name: Cooking is allowed only in designated kitchen areas.
description: Cooking is strictly prohibited in non-designated areas to prevent fire hazards and maintain cleanliness. No hot plates in bedrooms or hallways.

name: Do not park in front of neighboring houses.
description: Please avoid parking directly in front of their driveways or gates.

name: Quiet hours are serious — please be respectful.
description: Excessive noise may lead to immediate eviction from the premises to ensure a peaceful environment.

name: Close balcony doors when it rains.
description: Please make sure the balcony doors are shut when it rains to avoid water seeping in.

name: No frying, please!
description: We've had some issues with lingering cooking smells and oil stains. Please avoid frying inside — lighter cooking is welcome!

name: Close windows when using AC.
description: To help the air conditioner work efficiently.

name: Guests must not use host's personal belongings.
description: Some items in the home are for personal use only (they're labeled). Please don't use them during your stay.

name: Store food properly.
description: Please don't leave food on counters or outside the fridge — it attracts ants quickly in this climate.

name: Dishes: clean before you go.
description: As a courtesy to the next guest and our cleaning team, please wash and put away your dishes before checking out.

name: No towels on balcony railings.
description: Hanging towels or clothing over the railings isn't allowed — it can be unsightly and unsafe in strong winds.

name: Leave the furniture as is.
description: Please avoid moving items around to prevent scratches or accidents.

name: Use coasters on wooden surfaces.
description: We love our vintage wood furniture, and we hope you do too. Please use the provided coasters under drinks to keep it looking nice.

name: Toilets are for toilet paper only.
description: Please don't flush anything besides toilet paper — no wet wipes, cotton pads, or hygiene products. It really helps avoid plumbing issues!

name: Hair dyeing not allowed in bathrooms.
description: Hair dye tends to stain tiles and grout. To avoid any damage, we ask that you don't dye hair in the bathroom.

name: Turn off AC when not in use.
description: To help us conserve energy and reduce our footprint, please switch off the air conditioning when you're not in the room.

name: Stay safe on the balcony.
description: Please don't climb or lean on the balcony railing.

name: Eco-soaps only in the outdoor shower.
description: To protect the natural drainage and our plants, we kindly ask guests to use only biodegradable soaps in the outdoor shower.

name: No open flames indoors.
description: For safety reasons, we don't allow candles, incense, or any open flames inside. Thank you for understanding!

name: Windows closed before check-out.
description: Before you leave, kindly make sure all the windows are shut.

name: Lock up when you head out.
description: For your safety and ours.

name: Lights out after midnight.
description: To be mindful of our neighbors and reduce energy usage, we ask that you switch off any outdoor lighting by 12 AM.
